fields.text: Thank you for calling MemSQL in San Francisco, the enterprise-scale database platform delivering real-time transactions and analytics in a single platform.
To speak with our sales team about enterprise licensing and demos, press '[INDEX]'.
To reach customer support for technical help or billing, press '[INDEX]'.

For technical support and troubleshooting, press '[INDEX]'.
For account management and billing inquiries, press '[INDEX]'.
